title: Commanding Heights : Ricardo Lagos | on PBS

quotes: And that, I think, is the new world that is facing us in the 21st century.
Therefore, what normally you have is that in the short run -- I mean short run, 10 years -- you are going to have a more uneven distribution of income.
If we are able to sell our salmon to our friends in Paris ... then we may import some [items] from Paris, okay?
how are we going to make sure that that growth ... improves the standard of living of the worker ... who is doing his job in the Southern part of Chile to export the salmon?
Now of course I understand the discussion of what's happening in social security in Europe, that in Europe the flexible legislation is not much higher that the U.S., etc.
